title: The Draw of Conservatism with Piwa
description:
In this interview I have the chance do discuss with my friend from Instagram named Piwa, on the draw of Trump and conservatism in general. This episode is a response to represent both sides of the aisle from a previous interview I did a few weeks back. Looking forward to hearing your thoughts
Note: pls forgive the audio visual quality for this one...I had issues I just couldn't figure out...it really is worth the watch though

Listen to podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/The-Draw-of-Conservatism-with-Piwa-ev8jiu

follow me on twitter @AndeaLynnLewis
email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
